dcterms:description: The GRAZPEDWRI-DX dataset consists of 20327 annotated pediatric trauma wrist radiograph images of 6091 patients, treated at the Department for Pediatric Surgery of the University Hospital Graz. The images were annotated by several pediatric radiologists who placed bounding boxes to mark nine different classes, including bone anomaly, bone lesion, foreign body, fracture, metal, periosteal reaction, pronator sign, soft-tissue, and text.
dcterms:title: GRAZPEDWRI-DX
